items.name: Pink Birthday Bento Cake Set
items.description: Elegant bento cake set featuring a heart-shaped 'Happy 31st Birthday' cake with pearl border, accompanied by 4 matching cupcakes with pink and white frosting. Perfect for intimate celebrations and gift giving.

items.name: Humorous 25th Birthday Bento Set
items.description: Fun and playful bento cake set featuring a heart-shaped cake with 'Not me Turning 25' message and crying character, accompanied by 5 cupcakes with hilarious South African slang messages like 'HAMU SERIOUS!', 'Bathong 25 vele?', and 'HAIBO 25 VELE!'. Perfect for those who love humor with their celebrations.

items.name: Elegant Black & Gold Birthday Bento Set
items.description: Sophisticated bento cake set featuring a main cake with black buttercream rosettes, gold pearl decorations, and 'Happy Birthday' script, accompanied by 5 cupcakes including calendar design, personalized name, and elegant birthday messages. Perfect for milestone celebrations and sophisticated tastes.

items.name: Pink 21st Birthday Heart Cake
items.description: Beautiful pink heart-shaped cake with elegant ruffled piping and personalized birthday message. Perfect for milestone celebrations with decorative ribbons.

items.name: White Birthday Memorial Heart Cake
items.description: Elegant white heart-shaped cake with cream frosting and decorative black ribbons. Features personalized photo panels and custom birthday message. Perfect for special birthday celebrations and memorial occasions.

items.name: Olaf & Elsa 4th Birthday Cake
items.description: Magical Frozen-themed cake featuring beloved Olaf snowman topper with his signature smile and stick arms, plus Elsa portrait on the side. Decorated with blue and white winter theme, snowflakes, spherical decorations, and personalized name around the base. Perfect for young Frozen fans celebrating their special day.

items.name: Elsa 'Let It Go' 9th Birthday Cake
items.description: Spectacular three-tier Frozen cake featuring Elsa portrait on top tier with 'LET IT GO' text and number topper. Beautiful blue ombre ruffled layers transitioning from white to deep blue, decorated with snowflakes and sparkly base. A show-stopping centerpiece for any Frozen celebration.

items.name: Elsa Enzo 4th Birthday Cake
items.description: Enchanting two-tier Frozen cake with light blue frosting featuring Elsa portraits on both tiers, 'Happy Birthday' and number '4' toppers, white snowflake decorations, and blue & purple balloon clusters. Personalized with 'ENZO' on the base and decorated with pearl accents for a winter wonderland effect.

items.name: Elsa's Ice Castle Cake
items.description: A magical three-tier castle cake inspired by Elsa's ice palace, featuring shimmering blue and white fondant with edible snowflakes and crystal decorations

items.name: Petros Multi-Tier Spider-Man Cake
items.description: Spectacular multi-tiered cake with blue base, red brick wall backdrop, and various Spider-Man themed decorative elements including web patterns, city skyline, and character figurines. Perfect for superhero birthday celebrations.

items.name: Safari Lwandile 7th Birthday Cake
items.description: Sophisticated two-tier safari adventure cake with elegant green marble effect frosting, featuring golden safari animals including giraffe, elephant, and lion. Decorated with black tropical leaves, pampas grass, and a stunning balloon garland in gold, green, black and white colors. Perfect for safari-themed celebrations with 'LWANDILE 7' personalization.

items.name: Lion King Oreha 1st Birthday Cake
items.description: Delightful Lion King themed cake featuring beloved characters Simba, Timon and Pumbaa with wooden 'OREHA' sign and number '1' topper. Decorated with tropical leaves and sandy base decoration creating an authentic Pride Lands atmosphere. Perfect for young Lion King fans with colorful and child-friendly design.

items.name: Dinosaur Ugochukwu 3rd Birthday Cake
items.description: Exciting two-tier dinosaur jungle cake with 'Happy 3rd Birthday' banner featuring various colorful dinosaur characters on top including T-Rex, Triceratops, and Pterodactyl. Green and white tiers decorated with tropical foliage and 'UGOCHUKWU' personalization. Perfect for young dinosaur enthusiasts and prehistoric adventure themes.

items.name: Lion King Mvelo Safari Cake
items.description: Spectacular two-tier Lion King themed cake with Simba and Mufasa on top tier, featuring beloved characters like Timon and Pumbaa around the sides. Beautiful sunset colors with orange and blue tiers, elephant silhouettes, and 'MVELO' personalization on the base. Perfect for celebrating with the Circle of Life theme.

items.name: Safari Dithoriso Jungle Animals Cake
items.description: Amazing two-tier safari cake with blue and green colors featuring a wonderful collection of jungle animals including lion, monkey, giraffe, tiger, and zebra. Decorated with wooden 'DITHORISO' sign, tropical leaves, and lush foliage decorations creating an authentic jungle safari experience.

items.name: Safari Mzands 6th Birthday Cake
items.description: Beautiful green jungle-themed cake with '6' number featuring an amazing collection of safari animals including lion, giraffe, monkey, zebra, and elephant. Decorated with 'Mzands' topper, tropical monstera leaves, and wooden tree trunk base design creating a complete jungle adventure experience.

items.name: Unami's Disney Princess Castle Cake
items.description: Luxurious three-tier pink cake featuring Disney princesses with golden glittery castle, gold balloons, and butterflies. Perfect for princess-themed celebrations with magical castle design and royal decorations.

items.name: Rainbow Unicorn Fairyland Cake
items.description: Magical three-tier cake with pastel rainbow colors, featuring a beautiful unicorn topper with flowing mane, edible flowers, butterflies, and fairy tale elements. Perfect for creating enchanted celebrations.

items.name: Classic Mickey Head Cake
items.description: Traditional Mickey Mouse head shape with chocolate ears and classic red, black, and yellow color scheme. Perfect for Disney-themed celebrations.

items.name: Classic White Roses with Monogram
items.description: Elegant three-tier white wedding cake featuring handcrafted sugar roses cascading from top to side, with personalized gold script monogram on middle tier. Perfect for traditional and romantic weddings.

items.name: Navy & White Botanical Magnolia
items.description: Stunning four-tier wedding cake with alternating white and navy tiers, featuring textured chevron pattern and cascading white magnolia flowers with orange berries and natural greenery.

items.name: Gold Mandala Luxury Wedding Cake
items.description: Sophisticated three-tier cake with gold metallic top tier, pristine white middle tier, and ornate mandala pattern bottom tier. Features elegant white sugar flowers and luxurious gold detailing.

items.name: Portuguese Tile with Blue Bow
items.description: Cultural two-tier wedding cake featuring authentic Portuguese tile patterns on bottom tier with elegant white top tier. Crowned with a stunning blue patterned fabric bow and white flower accent.

items.name: Mediterranean Tile Pattern Masterpiece
items.description: Bold three-tier wedding cake completely adorned with intricate blue and gold Mediterranean tile patterns separated by elegant gold grid lines. Features decorative patterned fabric accent on top.

items.name: African Protea Cultural Wedding Cake
items.description: Vibrant two-tier cake celebrating African heritage with traditional beadwork patterns on middle tier and geometric tribal designs on bottom tier. Crowned with a magnificent protea flower.

items.name: White Roses Monogram with Texture
items.description: Refined three-tier white wedding cake featuring 'R+A' monogram, cascading white roses, and elegant textured bottom tier with vertical line pattern. Classic romance meets modern sophistication.

items.name: Modern Fabric Drape Sculptural Cake
items.description: Contemporary three-tier white wedding cake featuring dramatic flowing fabric-like fondant draping with elegant gold trim edges. A true work of edible art for modern couples.

items.name: Graduation Celebration Cake
items.description: Elegant graduation cake with cap and diploma decorations, perfect for celebrating academic achievements. Customizable with school colors and graduate's name.

items.name: Baby Elephant Shower Cake
items.description: Adorable baby shower cake featuring cute elephant decorations in soft pastel colors. Perfect for welcoming new arrivals with sweet elephant family theme.

items.name: Sports Car Novelty Cake
items.description: Realistic sports car shaped cake perfect for car enthusiasts. Features detailed car design with racing stripes and custom license plate option.

items.name: Corporate Logo Celebration Cake
items.description: Professional corporate cake featuring your company logo and branding. Perfect for office celebrations, product launches, and corporate events.

items.name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
items.description: Traditional homemade chocolate chip cookies with the perfect balance of crispy edges and chewy centers, loaded with premium chocolate chips.

items.name: Fresh Butter Croissants
items.description: Flaky, buttery croissants baked fresh daily with layers of delicate pastry. Perfect for breakfast or afternoon treats.

items.name: Classic Glazed Donuts
items.description: Light and fluffy yeast donuts with a sweet glaze coating. Made fresh daily for the perfect texture and taste.

items.name: Fresh Blueberry Muffins
items.description: Moist and fluffy muffins bursting with fresh blueberries and topped with a golden crumb topping. Perfect for breakfast or snacking.

items.name: Classic Roman Cream Cookies
items.description: Traditional South African sandwich cookies with a sweet cream filling between two golden biscuits. A beloved local favorite.

items.name: Chocolate Swiss Roll
items.description: Light chocolate sponge cake rolled with fresh cream and finished with chocolate shavings. A classic dessert perfect for any occasion.

items.name: Vanilla Buttercream Cupcakes
items.description: Moist vanilla cupcakes topped with smooth buttercream frosting and colorful sprinkles. Perfect for parties and celebrations.

items.name: Fudgy Chocolate Brownies
items.description: Rich, dense chocolate brownies with a fudgy texture and intense chocolate flavor. Made with premium cocoa and chocolate chips.

items.name: Classic New York Cheesecake
items.description: Rich and creamy New York style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust. Smooth, dense texture with the perfect balance of sweetness and tang.

items.name: Round Cake Boards Set
items.description: Professional quality round cake boards in various sizes. Perfect for presenting and transporting your cakes safely.

items.name: Square Cake Boards Set
items.description: Modern square cake boards for contemporary cake presentations. Sturdy and food-safe for professional results.

items.name: Custom Shaped Cake Boards
items.description: Specially designed cake boards in custom shapes and sizes. Perfect for unique cake designs and special occasions.
